content:
Could someone please explain how to invite someone to join this team? SHe is already on discord and in another DNC-based team, but I want to get her involved in the state-specific team of her state. 
Thank you.
Note that this is the national Team's server.  Some states are still using other platforms.   https://events.democrats.org/event/654007/
How do we find out if your state is using another platform?
Any question about states can ask in the state's channel, where volunteers can answer.
